name: CumulocityAlarmToFreshdeskTicket
description: This is the real IOT use case. Once the Alarm created in Cumulocity a real time ticket is also created in freshdesk so that the support team can take necessary action.

596c6278d906308d86423d1967378d75.title: Requester Email
596c6278d906308d86423d1967378d75.description: Enter the email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in your Freshdesk account, it will be added as a new contact

a018e874c82e1cbecf030a0c6afea2a6.title: Status
a018e874c82e1cbecf030a0c6afea2a6.description: Select the status of the ticket.

44e5c4d123db83dc3e63bc6b2352a262.title: Requester Email
44e5c4d123db83dc3e63bc6b2352a262.description: Enter the email address of the requester. If no contact exists with this email address in your Freshdesk account, it will be added as a new contact
